actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to establish a fuel stamp program which will provide fuel stamps to certain low-income elderly households to help meet fuel costs incurred by such households.

summary.text: Establishes a fuel stamp program which will provide up to twenty-five dollars worth of fuel stamps per month to low-income elderly households to help meet fuel costs incurred by such households. Requires each State desiring to participate in such a program to submit for approval a plan indicating the method of operation of the program in such State.

titles.title: A bill to establish a fuel stamp program which will provide fuel stamps to certain low-income elderly households to help meet fuel costs incurred by such households.
